content:
Is there any way to speed up the upgrading process via further periodization of upgrades and compartmentalization/parallelization of work without losing the wholistic approach?
Do you think that having a separate consensus-layer client and application-layer client is a blessing in disguise (by providing a natural compartmentalization)? Or do you think that it will become a hindrance after the consensus upgrade?
In other words, can the beacon-chain-plus-shards architecture be replicated in the upgrading process?
